name: Asynchronous APIs
description: Explore fundamental asynchronous JavaScript concepts, including callback functions and Promises.

name: Simple Persistence with the Web Storage API
description: Store and retrieve data using persistent storage.

name: URLs and Routing
description: Work with the URL and History APIs.

name: Network Requests
description: Communicate with remote servers and APIs.

name: IndexedDB
description: A more sophisticated data store which can store collections of objects.

name: Observing the DOM
description: Listen for changes to DOM elements and their structure.

name: Forms
description: Enhance your forms with the FormData and Constraint Validation APIs.

name: The Web Animations API
description: Apply keyframe animations to elements programmatically.

name: The Web Speech API
description: Add voice synthesis and recognition to your apps.

name: Internationalization
description: Explore the internationalization APIs built in to the browser.

name: UI Elements
description: Use dialogs and other interactive elements.

name: Device Integration
description: Interact with sensors and services on your device.

name: Working With the Console
description: Learn about different ways to present information using the Console API.
